name: helpers/FormHelper.js
FormHelper
description: Allows resolving element value.

name: isInput
description: Checks if the element is an "input".

name: isTextarea
description: Checks if the element is a "textarea".

name: isSelect
description: Checks if the element is a "select" element.

name: isCheckbox
description: Checks if the element is an input with the type "checkbox".

name: isRadio
description: Checks if the element is an input with the type "radio".

name: isNumberElement
description: Checks if the element is an input with the type "number" or "range".

name: GetCheckboxValue
description: Returns cheched or the checbox value.

name: GetInputValue
description: Returns the input value.

name: GetSelectValue
description: Returns the selected value or selected values (multiple).

name: getElementValue
description: Check the element type (input, checbox, select, textarea) and returns the value.

name: helpers/util.js
extend
description: Extends the target object with the source object.

name: clone
description: copies an object.

name: omit
description: Returns the source object without the omitted names.

name: helpers/ValidationHelper.js
ValidationHelper
description: Allows validating a value, a property or a form model with validations (required, minlength, maxlength, pattern, email, custom).

name: validateValue
description: Checks the value with the validations (pass the model to the custom validations) and returns the first error message.

return.description: The first error message or undefined.

name: validateProperty
description: Checks the property name with the validations (pass the model to the custom validations) and returns the first error message.
examples:
let error = ValidationHelper.validateProperty(model, 'lastname', validations);
// error => 'Lastname required'

return.description: The first error message or undefined.

name: hasValidations
description: Checks if the validations object has validations for the name
examples:
let errors = ValidationHelper.validateAll(model,validations);
// errors => {firstname: 'Firstname required', lastname: 'Lastname required'}

name: countErrors
description: Returns the length of the errors object.

name: hasErrors
description: Checks if the object is empty.

name: validateAll
description: Validates the form model and returns an object with the errors messages.

name: helpers/validations.js

types: {"required": string, "minlength": string, "maxlength": string, "pattern": string, "email": string, "custom": string}

name: isNullOrEmpty
description: Checks if value is null or undefined or an empty string

name: required
description: Checks if a value is undefined or null or an empty string or is false (for a boolean)

name: minlength
description: Checks if a value has the min. length.

name: maxlength
description: Checks if a value has the max. length.

name: pattern
description: Checks if a value match to the regex pattern.

name: email
description: Checks if a value is a valid email.

name: custom
description: Calls a function checking if value is valid.

params.name: fn
params.description: The function that receives the value, the model and returns a boolean.
